TEI.2.document_title: George Fisher to R. M. Williamson, 08-05-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: George Fisher to R. M. Williamson, Matamoros, August 5, 1834. Asking return of a book. Political news.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1071

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*George Fisher to R. M. Williamson, Matamoros, August 5, 1834. Asking return of a book. Political news.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Matamoros */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-05-1834">5th Augt. 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Robt M. Williamson Esqr*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*My dear Sir. My last respects to you were care of *person_mentioned*Mr. Meyer,*/person_mentioned* requesting you to do me the favor of forwarding me by said gentleman the 4th vol: of the "Novisimo Febrero," which I lendt to you in *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1832">1832 */date_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Anahuac*/location_mentioned*. I have received no answer, nor have I seen since *person_mentioned*Mr. Meyer*/person_mentioned*, who as yet has not returned; therefore if you have not delivered to him said Book, please to do it to the *person_mentioned*Bearer Doct. Cameron*/person_mentioned*, or if the Book is not to be had pay him 5$ the price thereof.*/p*
*p*The political situation of the *location_mentioned*Interior */location_mentioned*is in a dreadful state, and the whole *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*inveloped in a chaos,—The *person_mentioned*Bearer */person_mentioned*of this who is well informed of all that passes around us will explain you many things also a letter I have written to *person_mentioned*David G. Burnet Esqr*/person_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Lynchburg*/location_mentioned*, Duplicate of which I have directed to*person_mentioned* Mr. Saml. M. Williams */person_mentioned*in your place via *location_mentioned*Bejar */location_mentioned*to the care of *person_mentioned*Mr John McMullen.*/person_mentioned*—from sd letter you will learn particulars, and meantime I would recommend to the *person_mentioned*people of *location_mentioned*Tejas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* Union and mutual forbearance, sacrificing smaller interests for the great grand one, and burrying past strifes in eternal oblivion, is the desire of*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jorge Fisher */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
